title: Ben & Jerry's and Pizza Hut team up to give away 10,000 FREE ice creams
text:
Ben & Jerry's have created a special ice cream-flavoured 'slice' that is available to the first 10,000 orders of a large pizza at Pizza Hut.

The two iconic brands have partnered for the first time ever in Australia hoping they can give their customers something savoury and sweet for dinnertime.

Customers can get their hands on The Tonight Dough slice, inspired by legendary TV host Jimmy Fallon, from Friday.

Ben & Jerry's have create a special ice cream-flavoured slice that is available to the first 10,000 orders of a regular large pizza at Pizza Hut

The delicious pizza features caramel and chocolate ice cream with chocolate cookie swirls and chunks of chocolate chip and peanut butter cookie dough.

Also nicknamed the 'pint slice' it could be yours if you order your pizza online from Friday evening.

All you need to do is make your large pizza selection online and enter the special promotion code 'SLICESLICEBABY'.

If you miss out on the free dessert you can still pick up your favourite Chocolate Fudge Brownie and Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough flavours at Pizza Hut stores nationwide.

All you need to do is make your large pizza selection online and enter the special promotion code 'SLICESLICEBABY'

Ben & Jerry's is an American company that manufactures ice cream, frozen yogurt and sorbet.

When it arrived on Australian shores it was received with pure delight, namely because of its creamy texture and flavourful chunky pieces.

Both Pizza Hut and Ben & Jerry's have released vegan versions of their menu items so everyone can enjoy the treats.
